message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $825000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $775000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm not willing to go as low as $775000. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $800000, which is my minimum acceptable price. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer $785000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm not willing to go as high as $785000. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $810000, which is my final offer. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to both of us.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer $795000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I'm sorry, Bob, but I've already made my final offer of $810000. I'm not willing to go any higher. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I need to prioritize my own interests. If you're not willing to meet me at $810000, I'll have to consider other options.
